answers.author: Gregory Crocker
answers.text:
Matt,
Get in touch with DJ Weber at The Community Agency.  They did the exact same thing in O'Brien County, forming a consortium of four communities to build and operate a joint broadband system.  E-mail me if you'd like his contact information.


Matt,

answers.author: David Evertsen
answers.text:
Matt,   
Great idea. We would enjoy speaking with you.   
From cable TV franchise negotiations, central office inspections, regional broadband and fiber feasibility studies to municipal broadband strategic planning, I believe we can provide significant insight and leadership on this.  We have completed more than 300+ projects. Below is very small sample...  
http://www.municipalsolutions.org/content/?page=CATV 
Telecom, Broadband, Fiber & Wireless Communications   
   o   Flagstaff, AZ: Private Infrastructure, Maps & Municipal Strategic Plan   https://www.box.com/s/8878321c261ec5d349f4 
   o   Maricopa, AZ: Verizon Tower Review    https://www.box.com/s/2oakec98dol1e6yv06bu 
Citizen Surveys 
   o   Goodyear, AZ: Market Survey of Resident & Commercial Usage of Voice & Data   https://www.box.com/s/pay44d19eepkma67qc2o 
Franchise Audits & Right of Way Standards  
   o   23 Franchise Agreements Cable TV Franchises & Right of Way Standards (confidential, contact us)  
   o   Kingman, AZ: Cable TV Audit & Inspection Report   https://www.box.com/s/7z8an68gi20sm9g1pmda 
   o   Safford, AZ: Pole Attachment Fees Audit & Recovery   https://www.box.com/s/nwotkcas35pdvgbwfdmw 
Let me know if you are interested in a conversation.   
david evertsen, ceo & principal  
Municipal Solutions®   
phoenix office +1.928.220.2611      
web www.MunicipalSolutions.org     
blog www. MunicipalSolutions.org/blog   
linkedin   http://www.linkedin.com/company/municipal-solutions-llc-ltd 
twitter @MunSolutions

author: Matt Havlik
text: The City of Lake Forest, IL is in the process of organizing a municipal cable TV consortium with surrounding municipalties to cut costs and consolidate services.  Do you have any previous articles/information from past consortiums that were created?
title: Municipal Cable TV Consortium
